response.original_title: Knights of the Old Republic: Broken Souls (Reven vs Nihilus)
response.overview: DISCLAIMER: The following film is a work of Non-Canon fan fiction. It is inspired by the alternate Dark Side Ending storyline as seen at the end of Knights of the Old Republic. Everything including plots from Knights of the Old Republic II: Sith Lords has been rewritten to accommodate this alternate universe. This film is based off of characters from the "Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic" games. We do not claim ownership of anything in this video as all source material is owned by Disney/ Lucasfilm/ Lucasarts. This is a film made by the fans, for the fans.
response.title: Knights of the Old Republic: Broken Souls (Reven vs Nihilus)
